channel.title: Issue with webclient
channel.description:
Alright, well, i follwed Muroth's webclient tutorial. Everything went smoothly and worked perfectly up until i put the jar online.
whenever i run the webclient.jar from my desktop, it starts up and logs in without a hitch. The problem is when its being loaded online. Everytime i try to load the applet that starts it i get this error:
[IMG]http://i551.photobucket.com/albums/ii448/badger41badger41/error.png[/img]
without the cache downloaded it starts up and downloads the cache, after that itll give me that error, keep in mind that this online happens when i try to load it online through the applet.
Does anyone know what could be causing this error?
